comments.body: Consider using explicit types instead of `var` for improved readability.
The XML comment has an extra closing bracket ">" that should be removed.
The XML comment has an extra closing bracket ">" that should be removed.
Using `Math.Sqrt` and `Math.Pow` could be optimized if performance becomes an issue. Consider caching repetitive calculations.
Random instances should be reused to avoid performance bottlenecks and enhance randomness quality.

The condition seems overly complex and might be erroneous (e.g., `mouseY > y + EscapeButton.Bounds.Height / 2` should likely have a `-` in front of `EscapeButton.Bounds.Height`). Consider simplifying this logic.
